questions.question: To streamline operations
questions.answer: To make a system or process more efficient

questions.question: Change Agent
questions.answer: A person who helps an organisation transform

questions.question: Disruptive Innovation
questions.answer: Something that displaces established market leaders

questions.question: Future-proof
questions.answer: To design so that it continues to be useful in the future

questions.answer: Implementing a new system in stages

exercises.title: Reading: Implementing Change
exercises.text: To (1) ______ a competitive edge, many companies are forced to undergo significant restructuring. However, employees often show (2) ______ to change if they feel the (3) ______ is being threatened without clear benefits. A successful (4) ______ agent should communicate the vision clearly and implement a (5) ______ rollout to ensure a smooth transition.
